title: Xi Jinping does not have an official account on Twitter. This tweet is fake.
subtitle: Factly has found that Xi Jinping has no verified personal account on Twitter. Also, there is no account on Twitter with the mentioned username – ‘@realXiJinping20’.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A photo of a tweet purportedly made by Xi Jinping, the President of the People’s Republic of China, on Ladakh and Article 370 is being shared on social media. But, Factly has found that Xi Jinping has no verified personal account on Twitter. Also, there is no account on Twitter with the mentioned username – ‘@realXiJinping20’. The alignment of the text in the tweet is also not right. So, the tweet is fake

Did you watch our new video?
